name: Gifty
author: Gifty B.V.

sections.description:
The Gifty plugin enables you to add the Gifty order module to your WordPress website quickly and with ease.

Integration options

This are the available integration options:
* Add the order module icon to every page
* Embed the order module on any page or blog post
* Add a menu item to toggle the order module on any page

Registration and Installation

To be able to use this plugin you need the unique integration code that is provided in your dashboard. To get started you can register on gifty.nl.

Pricing

You can start using Gifty for free. Please check out our pricing page for subscription options.

Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions

We respect your privacy and only process your personal data for the purpose for which you have provided them. To read more on this subject please check out our Privacy Policy. Our global Terms and Conditions apply on this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

1.0.1

  • Minor code improvements and tested with recent WordPress version

1.0.0

  • First release of the Gifty WordPress plugin
sections.reviews:
Eenvoudig te gebruiken

By jeroen (jeroen262) on August 31, 2018

Handige plugin om de Gifty bestelmodule op een website te installeren!
